Articles.Content:
Hello, today i present you my attempt to recreate the Concorde (but in kerbal way!) ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) [0.90]

MAX SPEED 3.5 MACH Max Crew - 49

Mods- ,[FAR](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/20451-0-90-Ferram-Aerospace-Research-v0-14-6-12-27-14) ,[B9 Aerospace](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92630-0-90-B9-Aerospace-Release-5-2-8-%28updated-30-12-14%29) ,[MechJeb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/12384-PART-0-90-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-4-2)

Recommended mod - [Automate Vertical Velocity and Altitude Control](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50736-Vertical-Velocity-Control-in-1m-s-increments-with-compensation-for-vessel-angle)

Download [Here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/vvfi89wd8vlsk4w/Concorde-VTOL.craft?dl=0) (Dropbox, 493,83 KB)

Recommended Alt - 22500 , Too keep alt at 22500 set MechJeb Attiude Adjustment- Tf - Min 0.1 - Max 0.201.

Some SS: 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/vOCzP)

And yes i know it's not 1:1 but anyway it's cool ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif):cool: And it's working!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-07T16:25:25Z" title="03/07/2015 04:25  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 7, 2015</time> by Dnoe**
  
Ver+Speed

Wow. It looks beautiful, especially with B9 Aerospace!

I wish I could build like that!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks, im working on a Hypersonic version of it, (5+ Mach), more crew, better aerodynamics and better horizontal landing ,meaby even less lag by reducing part number.

Obviously VTOL too (Kerbal Style). ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Did you use procedural wings or something to get that wing shape? Looks great!

> 
> Did you use procedural wings or something to get that wing shape? Looks great!

Hi, no just standard B9 Aerospace.
